cookies.message: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your profile information and preferences
profile.preferences_description: Customize your account preferences and settings
profile.success_upload: Your avatar has been updated successfully
profile.success_save: Your profile has been updated successfully

profile.error_upload: Failed to upload avatar. Please try again.

security.update_failed: Failed to update password. Please try again.

email.title: Email Notifications
email.marketing_description: Receive emails about new features, promotions, and updates
email.security_description: Get notified about important security events and account activity
email.updates_description: Stay informed about new features and improvements

push.title: Push Notifications
push.comments_description: Get notified when someone mentions you or comments on your content
push.activity_description: Receive alerts about important account activity and changes
push.news_description: Stay up to date with the latest news and product updates

history.title: Notification History
history.description: View and manage your notification history

gdpr.description: Manage your data privacy preferences in accordance with GDPR

data_collection.title: Data Collection
data_collection.description: Control how we collect and process your data
data_collection.essential_description: Required data for core service functionality (cannot be disabled)
data_collection.analytics_description: Data used to improve our services and user experience
data_collection.personalization_description: Data used to personalize your experience

data_retention.title: Data Retention
data_retention.description: Control how long we keep your notification data
data_retention.retention_description: Choose how long to keep your notification history
data_retention.delete_description: Permanently delete all your notification history
